name: Blood Harvest 2
description:
Bloody Harvest 2

A hardcore platform game with lots of enemies, blood and explosions!

Go through many difficult locations, sinking lower and lower down the aisle.

Hardcore adventure with vigorous music and otvyznym classic gameplay!

  • Blow up enemies from a significant arsenal
  • Find the best weapons
  • Dangerous monsters creating problems throughout the game
  • Deadly traps at every turn!
